issue.title: [CF 717] Reordering Metaicons
issue.body:
When using leftclick-drag to reorder the subicons in a metaicon the subicons can become jumbled if you drag the icon too fast. This is especially true if there are very many subicons present.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #717 | Raw

comments.body:
Ok, I'll check it out.

Note to self: test this with a forced low framerate.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

It should be much improved in r688


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
